body: I don't get how I got ban for ban evasion. I wasn't trying to get make people get banned. I wasn't doing anything and I was just ban. This ban cannot be taken. May I have another moderator help me and see this. My moderator that banned me said that I had a ban evasion but thats not true. May I have someone's help please

title: I need help

replies.body: You can appeal your ban at https://avicus.net/appeal.
